channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court throws out Oklahoma inmate Richard Glossip’s murder conviction and death sentence
Southwest Airlines plane aborts landing after close call at Chicago airport
item.description: A Southwest flight had to quickly abort its landing to avoid a potential collision with a private jet.

item.title: Nearly 40% of contracts canceled by Musk’s DOGE are expected to produce no savings
Federal technology staffers resign rather than help Musk and DOGE

item.title: Federal judge rules Trump administration has to pay millions in foreign aid
item.description: Judge Amir Ali said the Trump administration violated a court order about foreign aid and is ordering them to pay millions to nonprofits.

item.title: Is a $150,000 home equity loan worth it?
item.description: A $150,000 home equity loan will lower your available equity, but it can still be worth applying for. Here's why.

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to pay bills to foreign aid contractors

item.title: Southwest plane has close call with business jet while landing
item.description: A Southwest Airlines plane landed safely at Chicago Midway International Airport after a close call with a business jet.

item.title: A Georgia deputy won't be charged for killing an exonerated man during a violent traffic stop

item.title: White House seizes control of press pool, will decide which outlets cover events with president
